TextAsset.value: Sure, Meowkie!
That sounds really fun, actually.
R-really? Wow... Boss, that’s great!
Y’know... you’re bein’ so nice to me an all...
I just wanna say...
I’m real glad you wanna spend time with someone like me, Boss.
It’s nothing, Meowkie, really!
After all... I want to.
(When she gets quiet like that... I’m not sure what to do!)
Okay, Boss! This is gonna be a great day!
You just wait here a minute...
I-if that’s okay.
I’ll go get some tasty snacks for us first!
The cafeteria has tuna fish sandwiches today.
AND I brought some tuna snacks from home!
(This girl... Really likes tuna...)
Uh... Th-that is...
I know tuna might not be… your VERY favorite...
But it ain’t like you HATE it... right?
(Actually, the real truth is...
I really do hate tuna!
But what kind of monster would I be to say no to that face?!)
Tuna... Tuna’s great!
...I knew it!
I knew you were a tuna fan...
There’s no way someone as nice as you wouldn’t be!
(“Someone as nice as me”? There’s no moral qualities that come with liking tuna…
At least I don’t think there are..)
You just sit tight, Boss! I’ll be right back with our snacks!
(The prospect of spending the day with Meowkie...
...I’m really excited!
Hmm, what’s that? Did I hear her name?
It sounds like those other kids over there are talking about her.
I know eavesdropping is wrong, but-
I can’t help but listen in!)
That Meowkie...
I don’t even get why they let her go to this school.
Just because her parents moved to this district so she could go to Namco High...
That shouldn’t mean anything, should it?
I know! This place is for, like, good guys.
Isn’t it dangerous to let someone like Meowkie in?
No matter where she goes to school...
She’s still a henchman for a bad guy!
(What? No she’s not!
How could anyone possibly think that about Meowkie?!
Have they even MET her?!)
Yeah, the Meowkie family is like, totally villainous!
They used to work for that Big Cat and everything!
It’s totally unfair that we have to go to school with some evil goon!
What happens when she finally turns on us?
(Meowkie’s not evil!
Her family’s not that bad either!
If they really did move just so they could send her to Namco High...
That means they’re trying really hard to give her a better life!)
The ONLY reason she’s not kicked out yet...
Is because that weird teacher King likes her.
Oh, I get it.
It’s a cat thing.
(I can’t stand hearing this!
How could they say that?!
If King really did give Meowkie special treatment, he’d let her out of detention!
Although...
Now that I think about it...
I never found out why she was in detention in the first place.
But Meowkie couldn’t REALLY have done something bad...
...could she have?)
She actually tried to get me in trouble, you know!
With that phony Hall Monitor act.
Just because I was writing on the bathroom walls...
She said it was “vandalism” or something.
I thought that was pretty rich, coming from an evil goon who like, probably does stuff like that all the time!
No way!
What did you do?!
I blamed it on her, of course!
She probably deserved to get detention for SOMETHING...
Serves her right, anyway!
Someone like HER, trying to get ME in trouble?
Yeah, right!
Haha! Nice one!
So that’s it...
That’s why Meowkie was in detention.
It wasn’t even her fault...
But the other kids think she’s bad, so they blame stuff on her.
I can’t believe it...
Someone as sweet as Meowkie could never deserve that.
I’ve got to say something...
I’ve got to stick up for her!
I’ve got to-)
Nyaa! Hiya boss, I’m back!
They had plenty of tuna, but...
Since I knew tuna might not be your favorite...
I got some salmon for ya too!
It’s kinda unorthodox, but what can I say?
You bring out a crazy side of me, Boss!
(For someone who likes tuna so much, that must seem like a really radical act.
I wanted to say something to those other kids, but...
It probably wouldn’t do any good to make a scene in front of poor Meowkie.
It would just hurt her feelings...
But I want to stand up for her.
What’s the right thing to do?)
Well Boss? Whaddya say?
...Thanks, Meowkie.
That’s really nice of you.
Come on, let’s go on patrol...
Together!
...Boss!
(That’s right... the best thing to do is...
To go with her proudly...
And show the others that I don’t care where she comes from.)
Hey Meowkie?
Do you mind if I ask you something?
Not at all, Boss!
…Even if it’s kinda...
Personal?
Nyaa... Boss... wh-what do you mean??
Erk! Sorry! I didn’t mean like that...
Uh, I was just kinda curious...
Do the other kids here ever treat you any different?
(There she goes, getting quiet again...)
Haha, of course they do, Boss!
I’m a cat after all!
Meowkie, that’s not what I-
I don’t take it personal or nothin’, though!
After all, some people can’t help bein’ allergic!
(She’s being weird and dodging my questions.
But I can tell she knows exactly what I’m talking about.
By acting this way, she’s telling me she doesn’t want to talk about it.
I should really respect that, and not push it right now.
But... maybe she needs me to push it?
What should I do?)
Meowkie, cut the innocent act.
I heard what the other kids say about you in detention!
They say mean stuff about you, they pin their rule breaking on you.
How can you put up with it??
Don’t be a coward! You should stand up for yourself!
If you keep letting it happen, it’s as much your fault as theirs!
...I dunno what you’re talkin about, Boss.
Meowkie...
(She’s speaking very quietly. But somehow, I still get the sense...
that she’s furious.)
Please…
I don’t mean to be demanding or nothing…
But let’s not talk about that stuff.
Okay?
...I’m sorry Meowkie… I just wanted to help…
Are you sure you don’t wanna talk about it?
…Yeah.
I mean it.
I don’t wanna say nothin’...
Out of… emotion.
Ya know?
…Meowkie, I’m sorry...
(I guess I have no choice...
I shouldn’t have called her a coward...
I shouldn’t have blamed it on her.
It’s just so unfair that anyone would be so mean to her...
But if she’s this angry... I should really just let it go.)
…Y-yeah... People can’t help being allergic.
(This is a little awkward.
Does she know what I’m thinking?)
Meowkie, I’m sorry for getting too personal.
I understand if you’re angry at me.
Nya, wh-what are you talking about, Boss?
I ain’t mad at you.
Are you sure? You seemed pretty upset there.
Oh, no no. No way!
I don’t get angry, boss.
Not at you, or anyone!
I just… don’t see the point, ya know?
After all, everyone’s trying their best.
Wait, what are you saying?
You don’t get angry… ever?
At anyone or anything?
Nope!
I just don’t see the point, you know?
It don’t exactly accomplish much.
Gettin’ angry... is just kinda silly!
Ha ha…
(Wow. I never would have guessed Meowkie was in this much denial…
She’s a little more… messed up… than I expected her to be.
Not that I hold it against her though…
Poor Meowkie…)
Oh! Around the corner!
What’s that? Are your Hall Monitor senses tingling?
(Thank goodness, a way to change the subject.)
Yeah! Just over there! Let’s go, Boss!
(What the- she just... grabbed my hand...
Oh man...
Is this her way of showing me she’s not upset that I tried to bring that stuff up?
Or... does it mean something more…
Wait, her claws aren’t gonna pop out while we’re holding hands, right?!)
Hey, stop that! Get away from me!
I need to hit you with my dragon amulet!
Stop squirming!
Noooooo!
(Yikes, what’s the story here?)
HALT, TROUBLEMAKERS!
Huh?? What’s the problem?
Roughhousing in the hallways!
We won’t allow it!
Right, Boss?
Er... y-yeah, that’s right!
But I must! Destiny commands it!
Would you defy destiny?
Help! She’s crazy!!
Er... I don’t know about destiny... but...
I do know that dawdling and rough housing are, um, against the rules!
Oh, who am I kidding! You’re just that evil henchman cat girl...
Nobody really listens to you!
I’m a goner...
Even y-you think...That I’m...
Hey!! What gives? She’s trying to help you!
An evil henchman? Is that so?
I’ve dealt with plenty like you in my time!
Stand aside! Don’t trifle with my destiny!
Meowkie, say something!
…Heh heh...
It’s okay, Boss...
(How is she not getting mad at what they’re saying?!)
What’s going on here?!
AAHHH!
OH!
Principal Dig Dug?!
What’s this ruckus out here?
Can someone please tell me what’s going on?!
…I was doing nothing wrong!
This so-called “Hall Monitor” is standing in the way of my destiny!
I heard she’s evil! Her parents used to work for bad guys!
Eek! Don’t let her start picking on me too!
She was making up reasons to get in my way!
It’s totally unacceptable! I have a quest to follow!
H-hey! What?? That’s totally unfair!
(I’m trying to argue, but everyone’s shouting over each other...
Blaming everyone else besides themselves...
Except for Meowkie, who’s just standing there.
What is she thinking right now?
I wish she’d say something...
Anything...
But I probably wouldn’t even hear it over all this shouting.)
That’s enough! BE QUIET!
I’ve heard quite enough.
I can’t sort out who’s right and who’s wrong.
So just to be safe...
You’re ALL in trouble!
(Feels like I’ve been waiting here outside Principal Dig Dug’s office for a long time...
He already talked to those other two, and they went on their way.
He talked to me too, and I’m on thin ice...
I better wait for Meowkie to be done, though.
There’s no way I’m leaving without her.
Poor Meowkie...
I can’t believe everyone thinks so poorly of her... Even people who are otherwise really nice, like Nidia and Blue Max.)
(But why won’t she say anything about it?!
Oh... the door’s opening.)
Meowkie!
H-how’d it go?
O-oh... Fine, Boss...
It was fine.
Oh, good.
Except... Principal Digdug...
He kinda...
Took away my hall monitor badge.
WHAT?!
How could he do that?!
Meowkie, please... talk to me.
It’s okay, Boss... I understand.
H-how does it look, after all...
To have a Hall Monitor who’s in detention all the time...
I... I’d probably do the same thing...
Ha ha...
That badge meant so much to you!
And no one deserves to have it more than you!
You didn’t even do anything to get in detention all those times!
Meowkie, you told him that, right?
You told him it’s not your fault you keep getting in trouble?
No way... I can’t do that.
Those other students... They just didn’t want to get in trouble.
Who...
Who can blame them?
Meowkie...
(She’s trying so hard to be happy and cheerful...
But this time, it’s obvious... she’s crushed.
Meowkie, please let me help you...
I hope you’ll talk to me soon.)
